title: The Wedding Banquet
itunes:title: The Wedding Banquet
description: God the Father has prepared a wedding banquet for his Son, and we are all invited. That is the poetic summary of salvation that can be found in the parable that Jesus tells this week. The urgent point is this: we must respond to the invitation, and we must don the proper wedding garment. Failure to do one or the other means we miss the celebration.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
